lead_paragraph: China issued the legal guidelines after a number of cases involving false confessions, most recently one involving a farmer who was wrongly imprisoned for 10 years.
snippet: China issued the legal guidelines after a number of cases involving false confessions, most recently one involving a farmer who was wrongly imprisoned for 10 years.

headline.main: China Bans Court Evidence Gained Through Torture
headline.seo: China Bars Torture to Obtain Confessions
headline.print_headline: China Bans Court Evidence Gained Through Torture
